column5: I would like to start making my own soft plastic baits this winter. Does anybody know of any PLASTIout a luck retailers in southern ontario? Preferably near kitchener.  (I mean the plastic material, I dont know why the word shows up like that)

You mean Plasti s  o l  . Someones's been havin a hay day with the dictionary of late.  P  O s came up as I di ot today... another word we aren't even supposed to use around here ! LOL  Sorry don't have a source other than ordering from Lure Craft or similar at $60 a gallon or so. I keep hearing of source in Belleville or vicinity.. but have never got a direct link to contact them.
The company you want is BassMagnet Lures. There web site is www.bassmagnetlures.com. They have alot of soft plastic material for making worms and tube.
